alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 18 at 7:29PM CST until January 18 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Central Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 830 PM CST. * At 729 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Bruin, or 27 miles southeast of Winnsboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Newellton around 735 PM CST. Port Gibson around 750 PM CST. Yokena around 800 PM CST. Rocky Springs around 805 PM CST. Reganton around 815 PM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and southwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
